greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter (prime signature of n & sum of squarefree divisors of n): a(n) = P(A046523(n), A048250(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16385
program: A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
A048250(n) = if(n<1, 0, sumdiv(n, d, if(core(d)==d, d)));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 10 2017
